 HyprSettings Debug Mode

    HyprSettings

    Hello! Please read!

    This is very much in its alpha state. Things may break, things may not work, things will still change. If you have time, dive in and make changes, and submit pull requests at the  Github repo

    A config has been written to ~/.config/hypr/hyprsettings.toml
    A font has been automatically chosen.
    If you don't see this droplet , or if you have a preferred font, please exit and change the font to a in the config file to some Nerd Font.(and comeback please XD)

    What's working?

    • The keybind, line comment editor.
    • You can remove # to turn line comment to a key(if valid)
    • Theming, settings, Autosaving! a lot actually. just check it out!
    • Adding items now exist*
      • *for now, it auto adds random keys available for a group

    What's not (yet) working

    • Keyboard navigation inside items.

    Usage:

    • F1: Show/hide this screen
    • F5: Reload Window(will update some elements)
    • Arrows: Navigation
    • Enter: Open a key editor modal
    • Esc: Leave the opened editor modal
    • Delete: Delete(lol) (will ask for confirmation)

    Next updates:

    • Prio: Navigation inside keys
    • Easy: Tooltips and Hyprland Documentation
    • Easy but theres so many: Item sliders,Color/Gradient Selectors

    For people who cloned this repo, remember togit pull on the folder you installed it in

    F3 Debug Screen

    Press F3 to get out of this screen
